cloneNode

public org.w3c.dom.Node cloneNode(org.w3c.dom.Document document,
                                  org.w3c.dom.Node original,
                                  boolean deep)
Deprecated. 
Clone node, which means copy a node into another document

Parameters:
document - New document where original nodes shall be attached to
original - Original node from original document
deep - true means clone also all children
Returns:
New node, which is clone of original node
